Publication Title: Differences in cell shape, motility, and growth reflect chromosomal number variations that can be visualized with live-cell ChReporters
Publication Authors: Michael P Tobin, Charlotte R Pfeifer, Peter Kuangzheng Zhu, Brandon H Hayes, Mai Wang, Manasvita Vashisth, Yuntao Xia, Steven H Phan, Susanna A Belt, Jerome Irianto, Dennis E Discher
Publication Abstract: Chromosome numbers often change dynamically in tumors and cultured cells, which complicates therapy as well as understanding genotype-mechanotype relationships. Here we use a live-cell "ChReporter" method to identify cells with a single chromosomal loss in efforts to better understand differences in cell shape, motility, and growth.
